get.summary: Lists all snapshots for a network. Optionally filters by session.

schema.title: Response Listsnapshots  Organization Name  Api V1 Snapshots  Get

post.summary: Executes a single rule against the target snapshot.
Update snapshot details, e.g., move to another network.

get.summary: Export all policies as a multi-doc YAML file.

post.summary: Import a file based policy for use in the web.

schema.title: Response Listeditabledocumentversions  Organization Name  Api V1 Edoc  Document Uuid  Versions Get
Response Listresourcesets  Organization Name  Api V1 Resource Sets  Get
Response Listresourcesetversions  Organization Name  Api V1 Resource Sets  Resource Set Uuid  Versions Get

get.description: List all members of the organization. This includes both managed users and invited users.

schema.title: Response Listorganizationmembers  Organization Name  Api V1 Members  Get

post.description: Create or invite a user in the organization. Creating a user creates a 'managed user', a whole user account managed by this organization. An invited user is not managed by this organization. You can disallow outside user invitations in the security settings.

schema.title: Response Createuser  Organization Name  Api V1 Members  Post

post.description: Modify user permissions and other settings.

delete.description: Remove a user from the organization. If the user is managed by this organization, the user account is deleted.

post.description: Re-invite a user to join the organization. This will send an email to the user with a link to join.
Re-issue a managed member setup link. This will send an email to the user with a link to create their account.
Generate a long-lived, revokable refresh token (API token).

schema.title: Response Createtoken  Organization Name  Api V1 Tokens  Post

delete.description: Revoke an API token and immediately invalidate all access tokens associated with it.

get.description: List usage events for an organization.

post.summary: Sets up a Stripe Checkout session.

get.summary: Gets the status of a stripe transaction.
Cancels a stripe subscription line item.

delete.summary: Cancels a stripe subscription line item.

get.description: Basic info about the current session.

post.description: Indicate the user has recently interacted with the UI.
Get or refresh access token from refresh token (cookie or API Token).
Create a snapshot by direct upload. This triggers snapshot evaluation and rule processing.

get.description: Check on the status of an in-progress snapshot evaluation task.

Reports are the results of evaluating a snapshot or testing a rule. This API lists reports. Each report contains a summary listing the result files for this report, plus an extras section condensing that information into user-friendly key-value properties.
Returns a summary of the report. Includes a listing of all data files and their row counts.
Fetches a data file as Apache Arrow (feather). Use the 'Get report details' endpoint for a listing of constituent data files.
Returns a user-facing textual or JSON summarizing the report. This is what users see when calling 'invariant show' in the CLI.
Returns a user-facing textual or JSON summary of a report file.

schema.title: Response Listintegrations  Organization Name  Api V1 Integrations  Get
Response Listrepositories  Organization Name  Api V1 Repositories Get
Response Listmonitortargets  Organization Name  Api V1 Monitor Targets Get

post.description: Modify organization-level security settings. Possible setttings include whether external users can be invited into this organization, whether certain login methods are permitted by default, and whether users managed by this organization are permitted to participate in outside organizations.
Create a new security integration. This is used to create an OIDC integration.
Modify a security integration. This is used to modify an OIDC integration.
Immediately terminate the current session. This invalidates the access token and cookie. API tokens are not affected.

get.summary: Get settings for the current entity.

schema.title: Response Autocomplete Channels  Organization Name  Api V1 Channels Autocomplete Get
